titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to eliminate multicandidate political committees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 04/06/1995--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to eliminate certain contribution provisions regarding: (1) multicandidate political committees; (2) political party senatorial campaign committees; and (3) authorized committees.
